Changing Good and Evil Nature
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 2 Archive (PSOne): Raising/Training Tips: Changing Good and Evil Nature
By torey_luvullo on Tuesday, April 18, 2000 - 06:10 am:

OK I know pretty much everything I need to! BUT NATURE! I never had a problem with it, it ALWAYS went like in a B-line for best. I never really cared how about the evil moves or anything but now I have a mochi/durahan and it's like worst to bad. i need to know how to get nature from good to bad, and bad to good. any little tips, or techniques you have would be appreciated. Thanks in advance!

-- ODINALOCA33 (robman_ds@hotmail.com), February 29, 2000

To resolve the "style" problem, don't praise it every time it does a "Great".
Changing nature is a relatively simple task. Just keep not pariasing, it takes several times to move down a level.
If you want a good natured monster, praise it when it gets a "Great".

---Dark Phoenix
